name: @junctionrelay/shader-thermal
description: Military FLIR thermal camera — iron/hot palette, edge detection, sensor noise, targeting reticle

junctionrelay.description: Authentic FLIR infrared simulation. Classic iron/hot 5-stop heat palette, Sobel edge detection pushing hot edges to white, fixed pattern noise + temporal sensor noise, detector readout banding, thermal lag ghosting, germanium lens vignette, and a minimal targeting reticle HUD with corner brackets. Fully self-contained.
